bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the establishment of a Family High Court, Family Circuit Court and Family District Court as divisions of the existing High Court, Circuit Court and District Court; to provide for the reallocation of jurisdiction in family law proceedings between the family courts; to provide for the assignment of Principal Judges and other judges to the family courts; to provide for the establishment of Family Circuit Court circuits and Family District Court districts; to provide for matters supplementary to the establishment of the family courts and matters relating to the judges of those courts; to make provision in relation to the conduct of family law proceedings before such courts; to provide for the establishment of a Family Law Rules Committee or Family Law Sub-committees of existing rules committees; and, for those and other purposes, to amend the Courts of Justice Act 1924, the Court Officers Act 1926, the Legitimacy Act 1931, the Courts of Justice Act 1936, the Enforcement of Court Orders Act 1940, the Courts of Justice Act 1953, the Courts (Establishment and Constitution) Act 1961, the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961, the Guardianship of Infants Act 1964, the Courts Act 1971, the Family Home Protection Act 1976, the Family Law (Maintenance of Spouses and Children) Act 1976, the Courts Act 1981, the Family Law Act 1981, the Status of Children Act 1987, the Judicial Separation and Family Law Reform Act 1989, the Child Care Act 1991, the Child Abduction and Enforcement of Custody Orders Act 1991, the Maintenance Act 1994, the Family Law Act 1995, the Civil Legal Aid Act 1995, the Family Law (Divorce) Act 1996, the Jurisdiction of Courts and Enforcement of Judgments Act 1998, the Protection of Children (Hague Convention) Act 2000, the Courts and Court Officers Act 1995, the Courts (No. 2) Act 1997, the Courts and Court Officers Act 2002, the Civil Registration Act 2004, the Social Welfare Consolidation Act 2005, the Land and Conveyancing Law Reform Act 2009, the Civil Partnership and Certain Rights and Obligations of Cohabitants Act 2010, the Adoption Act 2010, the European Communities (Maintenance) Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 274 of 2011), the Children and Family Relationships Act 2015, the Gender Recognition Act 2015, the Domestic Violence Act 2018, the Judicial Appointments Commission Act 2023, the European Union (Hague Maintenance Convention) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 594 of 2019), the European Communities (Decisions in Matrimonial Matters and in Matters of Parental Responsibility and International Child Abduction) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 400 of 2022) and certain other enactments; to provide for the protection of parties in family law proceedings; to provide for the repeal of certain enactments; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hArd-Chúirt Teaghlaigh, Cúirt Teaghlaigh Chuarda agus Cúirt Teaghlaigh Dúiche a bhunú mar rannáin den Ard-Chúirt, den Chúirt Chuarda agus den Chúirt Dúiche láithreach; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le dlínse in imeachtaí dlí teaghlaigh a athleithroinnt idir na cúirteanna teaghlaigh; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le Príomh-Bhreithiúna agus breithiúna eile a shannadh do na cúirteanna teaghlaigh; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cuarda Cúirte Teaghlaigh Cuarda agus dúichí Cúirte Teaghlaigh Dúiche a bhunú; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le nithe atá forlíontach i leith bhunú na gcúirteanna teaghlaigh agus maidir le nithe a bhaineann le breithiúna na gcúirteanna sin; do dhéanamh socrú i ndáil le himeachtaí dlí teaghlaigh a sheoladh os comhair na gcúirteanna sin; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le Coiste Rialacha Dlí Teaghlaigh nó Fochoistí Dlí Teaghlaigh de chuid coistí rialacha láithreacha a bhunú; agus, chun na gcríoch sin agus chun críoch eile, do leasú an Achta Cúirteanna Breithiúnais, 1924, an Achta Oifigigh Cúirte, 1926, an Achta Dlisteanais, 1931, an Achta Cúirteanna Breithiúnais, 1936, an Achta um Fheidhmiú Orduithe Cúirte, 1940, an Achta Cúirteanna Breithiúnais, 1953, Acht na gCúirteanna (Bunú agus Comhdhéanamh), 1961, Acht na gCúirteanna (Forálacha Forlíontacha), 1961, an Achta um Chaomhnóireacht Naíon, 1964, Acht na gCúirteanna, 1971, an Achta um Chaomhnú Áras an Teaghlaigh, 1976, an Achta um an Dlí Teaghlaigh (Cothabháil Céilí agus Leanaí), 1976, Acht na gCúirteanna, 1981, an Achta um an Dlí Teaghlaigh, 1981, an Achta um Stádas Leanaí, 1987, an Achta um Idirscaradh Breithiúnach agus Athchóiriú an Dlí Teaghlaigh, 1989, an Achta um Chúram Leanaí, 1991, an Achta um Fhuadach Leanaí agus Forghníomhú Orduithe Coimeádta, 1991, an Achta Cothabhála, 1994, an Achta um an Dlí Teaghlaigh, 1995, an Achta um Chúnamh Dlíthiúil Sibhialta, 1995, an Achta um an Dlí Teaghlaigh (Colscaradh), 1996, an Achta um Dhlínse Cúirteanna agus Forghníomhú Breithiúnas, 1998, an Achta um Chosaint Leanaí (Coinbhinsiún na Háige), 2000, Acht na gCúirteanna agus na nOifigeach Cúirte, 1995, Acht na gCúirteanna (Uimh. 2), 1997, Acht na gCúirteanna agus na nOifigeach Cúirte, 2002, an Achta um Chlárú Sibhialta, 2004, an Achta Comhdhlúite Leasa Shóisialaigh, 2005, an Achta um Athchóiriú an Dlí Talún agus Tíolactha, 2009, an Achta um Páirtnéireacht Shibhialta agus um Chearta agus Oibleagáidí Áirithe de chuid Comhchónaitheoirí, 2010, an Achta Uchtála, 2010, Rialacháin na gComhphobal Eorpach (Cothabháil), 2011 (I.R. Uimh. 274 de 2011), an Achta um Leanaí agus Cóngais Teaghlaigh, 2015, an Achta um Inscne a Aithint, 2015, an Achta um Fhoréigean Baile, 2018, an Achta fá Choimisiún um Cheapacháin Bhreithiúnacha, 2023, Rialacháin an Aontais Eorpaigh (Coinbhinsiún na Háige um Chothabháil), 2019 (I.R. Uimh. 594 de 2019), Rialacháin na gComhphobal Eorpach (Breitheanna in Ábhair a bhaineann le Pósadh agus in Ábhair a bhaineann le Freagracht Tuismitheora agus le Fuadach Idirnáisiúnta Leanaí), 2022 (I.R. Uimh. 400 de 2022) agus achtacháin áirithe eile; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le páirtithe in imeachtaí dlí teaghlaigh a chosaint; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hachtacháin áirithe a aisghairm; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: Bille na gCúirteanna Teaghlaigh, 2022

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to appropriate to the proper supply services and purposes sums granted by the Central Fund (Permanent Provisions) Act 1965, to make provision in relation to deferred surrender to the Central Fund of certain undischarged appropriations by reference to the capital supply services and purposes as provided for by section 91 of the Finance Act 2004 and, for the purpose of maintaining a sufficient amount of moneys in the Paymaster General’s Supply Account so as to enable the discharge of particular liabilities, to make provision for repayable advances from the Central Fund.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leithreasú suimeanna a deonaíodh leis an Acht Príomh-Chiste (Forálacha Buana), 1965 chun na seirbhísí soláthair agus na gcríoch cuí, do dhéanamh foráil i ndáil le géilleadh iarchurtha leithreasuithe áirithe neamhurscaoilte don Phríomh-Chiste faoi threoir na seirbhísí soláthair chaipitiúil agus na gcríoch dá bhforáiltear le halt 91 den Acht Airgeadais, 2004 agus, chun méid leordhóthanach airgid a choimeád i gCuntas Soláthair an Phámháistir Ghinearálta d’fhonn a chumasú dliteanais áirithe a urscaoileadh, do dhéanamh foráil maidir le hairleacain inaisíoctha as an bPríomh-Chiste.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Leithreasa, 2024

act.longTitleEn: Act to establish the Agriculture Appeals Review Panel to conduct reviews of decisions made by appeals officers under the Agriculture Appeals Act 2001; to prohibit unauthorised disclosures of information by members of the Agriculture Appeals Review Panel and the Forestry Appeals Committee; and, for those and other purposes, to amend the Agriculture Appeals Act 2001; to remove the requirement of members of the Aquaculture Licences Appeals Board to vacate office on attaining the age of 70 years and, for that purpose, to amend the Fisheries (Amendment) Act 1997; and to provide for related matters.
act.longTitleGa: Acht do bhunú an Phainéil Athbhreithnithe um Achomhairc Talmhaíochta chun athbhreithnithe a sheoladh ar bhreitheanna arna dtabhairt ag oifigigh achomhairc faoin Acht um Achomhairc Talmhaíochta, 2001; do thoirmeasc nochtadh neamhúdaraithe faisnéise ag comhaltaí den Phainéal Athbhreithnithe um Achomhairc Talmhaíochta agus den Choiste Achomhairc Foraoiseachta; agus, chun na gcríoch sin agus chun críoch eile, do leasú an Achta um Achomhairc Talmhaíochta, 2001; do chur deireadh leis an gceanglas atá ar chomhaltaí den Bhord Achomhairc um Cheadúnais Dobharshaothraithe scaradh le hoifig ar 70 bliain d’aois a shlánú agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta Iascaigh (Leasú), 1997; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Maternity Protection Act 1994; to provide that absence by a member of one of the Houses of the Oireachtas from performing duties as such a member in certain circumstances shall be called maternity leave for a member of the Houses of the Oireachtas; to amend the Employment Equality Act 1998; to amend the Social Welfare Consolidation Act 2005; to provide for the preservation, in the public interest, of certain records relating to certain institutions and bodies; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Chosaint Mháithreachais, 1994; do dhéanamh socrú, maidir le hasláithreacht ag comhalta de Theach de Thithe an Oireachtais ó dhualgais a chomhlíonadh mar chomhalta den sórt sin in imthosca áirithe, go dtabharfar saoire mháithreachais do chomhalta de Thithe an Oireachtais ar an asláithreacht sin; do leasú an Achta um Chomhionannas Fostaíochta, 1998; do leasú an Achta Comhdhlúite Leasa Shóisialaigh, 2005; do dhéanamh socrú, ar mhaithe le leas an phobail, maidir le taifid áirithe a bhaineann le forais agus comhlachtaí áirithe a chaomhnú; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the dissolution of the Marine Casualty Investigation Board and for its replacement with a unit within the Department of Transport to be known as the Marine Accident Investigation Unit; to provide for the investigation and reporting of marine accidents; to repeal the Merchant Shipping (Investigation of Marine Casualties) Act 2000; to provide for the regulation of offshore service vessels; for those and other purposes to amend the Merchant Shipping (Safety Convention) Act 1952, the Merchant Shipping Act 1992 and the Merchant Shipping Act 2010; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú chun an Bord um Thaismí Muirí a Imscrúdú a dhíscaoileadh agus chun aonad laistigh den Roinn Iompair ar a dtabharfar an tAonad um Imscrúdú Tionóiscí Muirí a chur ina ionad; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le tionóiscí muirí a imscrúdú agus a thuairisciú; d’aisghairm an Achta Loingis Cheannaíochta (Taismí Muirí a Imscrúdú), 2000; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le rialáil a dhéanamh ar árthaí seirbhíse amach ón gcósta; chun na gcríoch sin agus chun críoch eile, do leasú an Achta Loingis Cheannaíochta (Coinbhinsiún Sábháltachta), 1952, an Achta Loingis Cheannaíochta, 1992 agus an Achta Loingis Cheannaíochta, 2010; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the making available for supply, without charge, to certain women, of certain products used to alleviate the symptoms of menopause; and, for that purpose, to amend the Health Act 1970 and the Health (Pricing and Supply of Medical Goods) Act 2013; to amend the Health Insurance Act 1994 to specify the amount of premium to be paid from the Risk Equalisation Fund in respect of certain classes of insured persons from 1 April 2025; to amend the definition, in that Act, of high cost claim; to amend the Stamp Duties Consolidation Act 1999; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le táirgí áirithe a chur ar fáil lena soláthar, gan mhuirear, do mhná áirithe, is táirgí a úsáidtear chun maolú a dhéanamh ar airíonna meanapáis; agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta Sláinte, 1970 agus an Achta Sláinte (Earraí Liachta a Phraghsáil agus a Sholáthar), 2013; do leasú an Achta Árachais Sláinte, 1994 d’fhonn méid na préimhe a íocfar as an gCiste um Chothromú Fiontar i leith aicmí áirithe daoine árachaithe ón 1 Aibreán 2025 a shonrú; do leasú an mhínithe, san Acht sin, ar éileamh ardchostais; do leasú an Achta Comhdhlúite Dleachtanna Stampa, 1999; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Health Insurance (Amendment) and Health (Provision of Menopause Products) Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Árachais Sláinte (Leasú) agus Sláinte (Táirgí Meanapáis a Sholáthar), 2024

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for certain offences aggravated by hatred in the Criminal Damage Act 1991, the Criminal Justice (Public Order) Act 1994 and the Non-Fatal Offences against the Person Act 1997; for that purpose, to provide for amendments of those and other enactments; to provide in respect of certain offences for hatred against a person or a group of persons on account of certain characteristics (referred to as protected characteristics) of the person or the group of persons to be an aggravating factor in sentencing for those offences; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cionta áirithe arna dtromú le fuath san Acht um Dhamáiste Coiriúil, 1991, san Acht um Cheartas Coiriúil (Ord Poiblí), 1994 agus san Acht um Chionta Neamh-Mharfacha in aghaidh an Duine, 1997; chun na críche sin, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le leasuithe ar na hachtacháin sin agus ar achtacháin eile; do dhéanamh socrú, i leith cionta áirithe, maidir le fuath in aghaidh duine nó grúpa daoine mar gheall ar thréithe áirithe (dá ngairtear tréithe cosanta) de chuid an duine nó an ghrúpa daoine a bheith ina thromú ar na cionta sin le linn pianbhreitheanna a chur; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Cheartas Coiriúil (Cionta Fuatha), 2022

act.longTitleEn: Act to provide for the establishment of a body to be known as Údarás Rialála Cearrbhachais na hÉireann or, in the English language, the Gambling Regulatory Authority of Ireland for the purposes of licensing and regulating betting, gaming, certain lotteries and the sale or supply of products or services related to gambling; to provide for the funding of that Authority by means of imposition of a charge on licensees; to provide for the establishment and maintenance of a register of persons who hold gambling licences in the State and a National Gambling Exclusion Register; to provide for the establishment of a Social Impact Fund to, among other matters, finance research into, raise awareness of, and eliminate or reduce, compulsive and excessive gambling; to provide for contributions to the Fund by certain licensees; to provide for the imposition of obligations on those licensees including obligations relating to advertising, promotion and sponsorship for the purposes of safeguarding persons participating in gambling; to provide for the prohibition of children participating in gambling or being employed in the gambling industry; to provide, for the purposes of ensuring conditions attached to gambling licences and obligations imposed on licensees are complied with, for compliance and enforcement measures; and for those and other purposes to repeal the Totalisator Act 1929, the Betting Act 1931, the Gaming and Lotteries Act 1956, to revoke certain statutory instruments and to provide for the consequential amendment of certain other enactments; and to provide for related matters.
act.longTitleGa: Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le comhlacht a bhunú ar a dtabharfar Údarás Rialála Cearrbhachais na hÉireann nó, sa Bhéarla, the Gambling Regulatory Authority of Ireland, chun gealltóireacht, cearrbhachas, crannchuir áirithe agus díol nó soláthar táirgí nó seirbhísí a bhaineann le cearrbhachas a cheadúnú agus a rialáil; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le maoiniú an Údaráis sin trí mhuirear a fhorchur ar cheadúnaithe; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le clár de dhaoine a shealbhaíonn ceadúnais chearrbhachais sa Stát agus Clár Náisiúnta Eisiaimh Cearrbhachais a bhunú agus a chothabháil; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le Ciste Tionchair Shóisialta a bhunú chun taighde ar chearrbhachas iallaigh agus iomarcach a mhaoiniú, chun cur le feasacht ar chearrbhachas den sórt sin, agus chun deireadh a chur leis nó é a laghdú, i measc nithe eile; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le ranníocaíochtaí leis an gCiste ag ceadúnaithe áirithe; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hoibleagáidí a fhorchur ar na ceadúnaithe sin, lena n-áirítear oibleagáidí a bhaineann le fógraíocht, cur chun cinn agus urraíocht, chun daoine a ghlacann páirt i gcearrbhachas a chosaint; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le toirmeasc a chur le leanaí do ghlacadh páirt i gcearrbhachas nó a bheith fostaithe sa tionscal cearrbhachais; do dhéanamh socrú, chun a chinntiú go ndéanfar coinníollacha a ghabhann le ceadúnais chearrbhachais agus oibleagáidí a fhorchuirtear ar cheadúnaithe a chomhlíonadh, maidir le bearta um chomhlíonadh agus bearta forfheidhmiúcháin; agus, chun na gcríoch sin agus chun críoch eile, d’aisghairm Acht na Suimitheoirí, 1929, an Achta um Gheall-Chur, 1931, an Achta um Chearrbhachas agus Crannchuir, 1956, do chúlghairm ionstraimí reachtúla áirithe agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le leasú iarmhartach a dhéanamh ar achtacháin áirithe eile; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to regulate, for the purpose of Article 18.4.2° of the Constitution of Ireland, elections (including bye-elections as well as general elections) of those elected members of Seanad Éireann who are required by that Constitution to be elected by universities or other institutions of higher education in the State, to define the franchise on which such members are to be elected, to amend the Seanad Electoral (University Members) Act 1937, to provide for vacancies in Seanad Éireann in the Higher Education constituency to be filled from replacement candidates lists and to provide for matters incidental to or connected with such elections.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun rialáil a dhéanamh, chun críoch Airteagal 18.4.2° de Bhunreacht na hÉireann, ar thoghcháin (idir chorrthoghcháin agus olltoghcháin) do na comhaltaí tofa sin de Sheanad Éireann gur gá de réir an Bhunreachta sin gur ollscoileanna nó forais eile ardoideachais sa Stát a thoghfadh iad,  do mhíniú an toghchórais ar dá réir a thoghfar na comhaltaí sin, do leasú Acht Toghacháin an tSeanaid (Baill Phríomh-Scoile), 1937, do dhéanamh socrú go ndéanfar folúntais i Seanad Éireann sa toghlach Ardoideachais a líonadh as liostaí iarrthóirí ionaid agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe a bhaineann nó a ghabhann leis na toghcháin sin.
bill.shortTitleGa: Bille Toghcháin an tSeanaid (Baill Phríomh-Scoile) (Leasú), 2024

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the establishment of a body, to be known as the Gasra um Plean Gníomhaíochta i leith an Uathachais agus um Chomhairle, to monitor and advise on the implementation of the Autism Innovation Strategy and any autism action plan published under this Act; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le comhlacht a bhunú, ar a dtabharfar an Gasra um Plean Gníomhaíochta i leith an Uathachais agus um Chomhairle, chun faireachán agus comhairliú a dhéanamh maidir le cur i ngníomh na Straitéise Nuálaíochta um an Uathachas agus aon phlean gníomhaíochta i leith an uathachais a fhoilseofar faoin Acht seo; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Ghníomhú i leith an Uathachais agus um Fhormhaoirsiú, 2024

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for an offence for the action commonly known as catfishing and for that purpose to provide for the identification of such an offence; to amend and extend the Non-Fatal Offences Against the Person Act 1997 and to provide for consequential amendments to the Broadcasting Act 2009; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cion arb éard é an gníomh ar a dtugtar de ghnáth claonmhealltóireacht ar líne agus, chun na críche sin, do dhéanamh socrú chun cion den sórt sin a shainaithint; do leasú agus do leathnú an Achta um Chionta Neamh-Mharfacha in aghaidh an Duine, 1997 agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le leasuithe iarmhartacha ar an Acht Craolacháin, 2009; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chionta Neamh-Mharfacha in aghaidh an Duine (Leasú), 2024

act.shortTitleGa: An tAcht um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2024

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to ban the importation of non-native honey bees with the aim of reducing the threat to and adverse impact upon biodiversity and the ecosystem arising from the introgression/crossing/cross-breeding of the native Irish Honey Bee, Apis mellifera mellifera, due to the importation of non-native species or sub-species of and/or strains derived from Apis mellifera and to provide for the appointment of authorised officers; to make it an offence to forge an animal health certificate; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chur cosc le beacha nach beacha meala dúchasacha Éireannacha a allmhairiú, d’fhonn laghdú a dhéanamh ar an mbagairt, agus ar an drochthionchar, ar an mbithéagsúlacht agus ar an éiceachóras a eascraíonn as ionghabháil/crosáil/crosphórú na Beiche Meala dúchasaí Éireannaí, Apis mellifera mellifera, mar gheall ar allmhairiú speiceas neamhdhúchasach nó fospeiceas d’Apis mellifera agus/nó tréithchineálacha a dhíorthaíonn as Apis mellifera agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hoifigigh údaraithe a cheapadh; do dhéanamh cion de dheimhniú um shláinte ainmhí a bhrionnú; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Protection of the Native Irish Honey Bee Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an mBeach Mheala Dhúchasach Éireannach a Chosaint, 2021

bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thabhairt tuilleadh éifeachta do Threoir 2014/24/AE ó Pharlaimint na hEorpa agus ón gComhairle an 26 Feabhra 2014 agus, chun na críche sin, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le feidhmeanna tuairiscithe áirithe i ndáil le sainfháil a bhfuil feidhm ag an Treoir sin maidir léi, do leasú Acht na gCuideachtaí, 2014 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Transparency and Social Value in Public Procurement Bill 2024

act.longTitleEn: Act to provide, due to the continued high cost of global energy prices since the completion of payments under the Electricity Costs Emergency Benefit Scheme III and the Submeter Support Scheme, for the establishment of further schemes in accordance with this Act out of resources available to the Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications, to be known as the Electricity Costs Emergency Benefit Scheme IV for the purpose of making further electricity costs emergency benefit payments during the period commencing on the date of the passing of this Act and ending on 31 August 2025 and to be known as the Submeter Support Scheme II for the purpose of making submeter support scheme payments during the period commencing on the date of the passing of this Act and ending on 31 August 2025; for the purpose of the Electricity Costs Emergency Benefit Scheme IV to confer functions on the distribution system operator and electricity suppliers; for the purpose of the Submeter Support Scheme II to confer functions on electricity suppliers; to confer functions on the Commission for Regulation of Utilities in relation to each of the Schemes and for that purpose to amend the Electricity Regulation Act 1999; to provide that the electricity costs emergency benefit payments and the submeter support scheme payments are exempt from income tax and for that purpose to amend the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997; to enable the Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications to make regulations in relation to the operation of the Schemes; and to provide for related matters.
act.longTitleGa: Acht do dhéanamh socrú, mar gheall ar an gcostas ard leanúnach a ghabhann le praghsanna fuinnimh domhanda ó cuireadh críoch le híocaíochtaí faoi Scéim III um Shochar Éigeandála Costas Leictreachais agus faoin Scéim Tacaíochta Fomhéadair, maidir le scéimeanna eile a bhunú de réir an Achta seo as acmhainní atá ar fáil don Aire Comhshaoil, Aeráide agus Cumarsáide, ar a dtabharfar Scéim IV um Shochar Éigeandála Costas Leictreachais d’fhonn íocaíochtaí breise sochair éigeandála costas leictreachais a dhéanamh le linn na tréimhse dar tosach dáta rite an Achta seo agus dar críoch an 31 Lúnasa 2025 agus ar a dtabharfar Scéim II um Thacaíocht Fomhéadair d’fhonn íocaíochtaí scéime tacaíochta fomhéadair a dhéanamh le linn na tréimhse dar tosach dáta rite an Achta seo agus dar críoch an 31 Lúnasa 2025; chun críoch Scéim IV um Shochar Éigeandála Costas Leictreachais, do thabhairt feidhmeanna don oibritheoir córais dáiliúcháin agus do sholáthróirí leictreachais; chun críoch Scéim II um Thacaíocht Fomhéadair, do thabhairt feidhmeanna do sholáthróirí leictreachais; do thabhairt feidhmeanna don Choimisiún um Rialáil Fóntais i ndáil le gach ceann de na Scéimeanna agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta um Rialáil Leictreachais, 1999; do dhéanamh socrú chun go mbeidh na híocaíochtaí sochair éigeandála costas leictreachais agus na híocaíochtaí scéime tacaíochta fomhéadair díolmhaithe ó cháin ioncaim agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta Comhdhlúite Cánacha, 1997; dá chumasú don Aire Comhshaoil, Aeráide agus Cumarsáide rialacháin a dhéanamh i ndáil le hoibriú na Scéimeanna; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
act.shortTitleEn: Electricity Costs (Emergency Measures) Domestic Accounts Act 2024
act.shortTitleGa: An tAcht um Chostais Leictreachais (Bearta Éigeandála) i leith Cuntais Tí, 2024

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide, due to the continued high cost of global energy prices since the completion of payments under the Electricity Costs Emergency Benefit Scheme III and the Submeter Support Scheme, for the establishment of further schemes in accordance with this Act out of resources available to the Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications, to be known as the Electricity Costs Emergency Benefit Scheme IV for the purpose of making further electricity costs emergency benefit payments during the period commencing on the date of the passing of this Act and ending on 31 August 2025 and to be known as the Submeter Support Scheme II for the purpose of making submeter support scheme payments during the period commencing on the date of the passing of this Act and ending on 31 August 2025; for the purpose of the Electricity Costs Emergency Benefit Scheme IV to confer functions on the distribution system operator and electricity suppliers; for the purpose of the Submeter Support Scheme II to confer functions on electricity suppliers; to confer functions on the Commission for Regulation of Utilities in relation to each of the Schemes and for that purpose to amend the Electricity Regulation Act 1999; to provide that the electricity costs emergency benefit payments and the submeter support scheme payments are exempt from income tax and for that purpose to amend the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997; to enable the Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications to make regulations in relation to the operation of the Schemes; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú, mar gheall ar an gcostas ard leanúnach a ghabhann le praghsanna fuinnimh domhanda ó cuireadh críoch le híocaíochtaí faoi Scéim III um Shochar Éigeandála Costas Leictreachais agus faoin Scéim Tacaíochta Fomhéadair, maidir le scéimeanna eile a bhunú de réir an Achta seo as acmhainní atá ar fáil don Aire Comhshaoil, Aeráide agus Cumarsáide, ar a dtabharfar Scéim IV um Shochar Éigeandála Costas Leictreachais d’fhonn íocaíochtaí breise sochair éigeandála costas leictreachais a dhéanamh le linn na tréimhse dar tosach dáta rite an Achta seo agus dar críoch an 31 Lúnasa 2025 agus ar a dtabharfar Scéim II um Thacaíocht Fomhéadair d’fhonn íocaíochtaí scéime tacaíochta fomhéadair a dhéanamh le linn na tréimhse dar tosach dáta rite an Achta seo agus dar críoch an 31 Lúnasa 2025; chun críoch Scéim IV um Shochar Éigeandála Costas Leictreachais, do thabhairt feidhmeanna don oibritheoir córais dáiliúcháin agus do sholáthróirí leictreachais; chun críoch Scéim II um Thacaíocht Fomhéadair, do thabhairt feidhmeanna do sholáthróirí leictreachais; do thabhairt feidhmeanna don Choimisiún um Rialáil Fóntais i ndáil le gach ceann de na Scéimeanna agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta um Rialáil Leictreachais, 1999; do dhéanamh socrú chun go mbeidh na híocaíochtaí sochair éigeandála costas leictreachais agus na híocaíochtaí scéime tacaíochta fomhéadair díolmhaithe ó cháin ioncaim agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta Comhdhlúite Cánacha, 1997; dá chumasú don Aire Comhshaoil, Aeráide agus Cumarsáide rialacháin a dhéanamh i ndáil le hoibriú na Scéimeanna; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Electricity Costs (Emergency Measures) Domestic Accounts Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chostais Leictreachais (Bearta Éigeandála) i leith Cuntais Tí, 2024

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the imposition, repeal, remission, alteration and regulation of taxation, of stamp duties and of duties relating to excise and otherwise to make further provision in connection with finance; to make provision for supports to employers and certain businesses and for that purpose to amend the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997, the Social Welfare Consolidation Act 2005, the Value-Added Tax Consolidation Act 2010 and Part 7 of the Emergency Measures in the Public Interest (Covid-19) Act 2020; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le forchur, aisghairm, loghadh, athrú agus rialáil cánachais, dleachtanna stampa agus dleachtanna a bhaineann le mál agus do dhéanamh socrú breise thairis sin i dtaobh airgeadais; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le tacaí d’fhostóirí agus do ghnóthaí áirithe agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta Comhdhlúite Cánacha, 1997, an Achta Comhdhlúite Leasa Shóisialaigh, 2005, an Achta Comhdhlúite Cánach Breisluacha, 2010 agus Chuid 7 den Acht um Bearta Éigeandála ar mhaithe le Leas an Phobail (Covid-19), 2020; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Airgeadais, 2024

debates.showAs: Sale of Nitrous Oxide and Related Products Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to regulate and licence the sale of nitrous oxide to exempted purchasers, to prohibit the sale of nitrous oxide and nitrous oxide products to a person who has not attained the age of 18 years, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do rialáil agus do cheadúnú díol ocsaíde nítriúla le ceannaitheoirí díolmhaithe, do thoirmeasc ocsaíd nítriúil agus táirgí ocsaíde nítriúla a dhíol le duine nach bhfuil 18 mbliana d’aois slánaithe aige nó aici, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Sale of Nitrous Oxide and Related Products Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Dhíol Ocsaíde Nítriúla agus Táirgí Gaolmhara, 2024

debates.showAs: Planning and Development (Stationary Battery Energy Storage Systems) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend the Planning and Development Regulations 2001 to include in the classes of development requiring an environmental impact assessment report certain installations of stationary battery energy storage systems, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú na Rialachán um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2001 chun go ndéanfar suiteálacha áirithe córas stórála fuinnimh i gceallraí suite a áireamh sna haicmí forbartha ar gá tuarascáil ar mheasúnacht tionchair timpeallachta ina leith, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Planning and Development (Stationary Battery Energy Storage Systems) Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Pleanáil agus Forbairt (Córais Stórála Fuinnimh i gCeallraí Suite), 2024

debates.showAs: Sale of Tickets (Cultural, Entertainment, Recreational and Sporting Events) (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Sale of Tickets (Cultural, Entertainment, Recreational and Sporting Events) Act 2021 so as to prohibit a primary ticket seller from engaging in dynamic pricing when selling, or advertising for sale, tickets or ticket packages for cultural, entertainment, recreational and sporting events, and to promote fairer access to tickets by prohibiting the sale, or advertising for sale, of tickets or ticket packages for a price that is adjusted or set by dynamic pricing to meet increased demand.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Dhíol Ticéad (Imeachtaí Cultúir, Siamsaíochta, Áineasa agus Spóirt), 2021 d’fhonn toirmeasc a chur ar phríomhdhíoltóir ticéad a bheith ag gabháil do phraghsáil dhinimiciúil tráth a bheidh ticéid nó pacáistí ticéad le haghaidh imeachtaí cultúir, siamsaíochta, áineasa agus spóirt á ndíol nó tráth a bheidh ticéid nó pacáistí ticéad le haghaidh imeachtaí den sórt sin á bhfógairt lena ndíol, agus d’fhonn rochtain ar thicéid ar bhonn níos córa a chur chun cinn trí thoirmeasc a chur le ticéid nó le pacáistí ticéad a dhíol, nó le ticéid nó le pacáistí ticéad a fhógairt lena ndíol, ar phraghas a dhéantar a choigeartú nó a shocrú le praghsáil dhinimiciúil chun freastal ar an méadú ar éileamh.
bill.shortTitleEn: Sale of Tickets (Cultural, Entertainment, Recreational and Sporting Events) (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Dhíol Ticéad (Imeachtaí Cultúir, Siamsaíochta, Áineasa agus Spóirt) (Leasú) (Uimh. 2), 2024

No. 485 of 2015); and to provide for related matters.

debates.showAs: Workplace Relations (Exemplary Damages, Unfair Dismissals and Other Provisions) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to enable the award of exemplary damages in certain circumstances by adjudication officers of the Workplace Relations Commission and by the Labour Court; to make certain non-disclosure agreements unenforceable as against employees who have not received independent advice; to make amendments to the Unfair Dismissals Act 1977 in order to give fuller effect to Directive (EU) 2019/1152 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 20 June 2019 on transparent and predictable working conditions in the European Union; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá chumasú d’oifigigh bhreithniúcháin don Choimisiún um Chaidreamh san Áit Oibre agus don Chúirt Oibreachais damáistí eiseamláireacha a dhámhachtain in imthosca áirithe; do dhéanamh comhaontuithe neamhnochta áirithe neamh-infhorfheidhmithe amhail i gcoinne fostaithe nach mbeidh comhairle neamhspleách faighte acu; do dhéanamh leasuithe ar an Acht um Dhífhostú Éagórach, 1977 d’fhonn éifeacht a thabhairt ar shlí níos iomláine do Threoir (AE) 2019/1152 ó Pharlaimint na hEorpa agus ón gComhairle an 20 Meitheamh 2019 maidir le dálaí oibre trédhearcacha agus intuartha san Aontas Eorpach; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Workplace Relations (Exemplary Damages, Unfair Dismissals and Other Provisions) Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chaidreamh san Áit Oibre (Damáistí Eiseamláireacha, Dífhostú Éagórach agus Forálacha Eile), 2024

act.longTitleEn: Act to amend the Criminal Justice Act 1990 as regards its application to the sentencing of persons, who, at the time of the commission by them of certain offences to which that Act applies, were under the age of 18 years; and to provide for related matters.
act.longTitleGa: Acht do leasú an Achta um Cheartas Coiriúil, 1990 i ndáil leis an bhfeidhm atá ag an Acht sin maidir le pianbhreith a ghearradh ar dhaoine a bhí, an tráth a rinne siad cionta áirithe a bhfuil feidhm ag an Acht sin maidir leo, faoi bhun 18 mbliana d’aois; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

Statute Law Revision Bill 2024: Second Stage

bill.longTitleEn: An Act to provide for the revision of statute law by revoking, with the exception of certain instruments, every instrument made before 1 January 1861, to identify those instruments that are not being revoked by this Act, to assign citations to those instruments so as to facilitate their citation, to provide a means by which prima facie evidence of certain instruments may be given, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis an dlí reachtúil a athchóiriú trí gach ionstraim a rinneadh roimh an 1 Eanáir 1861 a chúlghairm, seachas ionstraimí áirithe, do shainaithint na n-ionstraimí sin nach bhfuil á gcúlghairm leis an Acht seo, do shannadh luanna do na hionstraimí sin d’fhonn a lua a éascú, do sholáthar meán trína bhféadfar fianaise prima facie ar ionstraimí áirithe a thabhairt, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Athchóiriú an Dlí Reachtúil, 2024

as.showAs: Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and Reform

debates.showAs: Transport (Vehicle Registration Plate Suppliers) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the regulation of persons who manufacture, sell or otherwise supply vehicle registration plates and for that purpose to provide for the establishment by the Minister for Finance of a register of persons who manufacture for sale or supply, or who sell or supply, such plates and to provide for the keeping and maintaining of such register; to enable that Minister by regulations to require such persons to  keep records of such manufacture, sale or supply in such manner as that Minister may prescribe by regulations; to provide for matters relating to an application for renewal of any registration under this Act;  to exempt any such person or class of persons from keeping such records either generally or in respect of any class of business;  to enable that Minister to make regulations so that the identification of  the manufacturer or supplier of any vehicle registration plates can be determined from those plates; to provide for authorised officers;  and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le rialáil daoine a dhéanann plátaí clárúcháin feithicle a mhonarú, a dhíol nó a sholáthar ar shlí eile agus, chun na críche sin, do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis an Aire  Airgeadais do bhunú clár de dhaoine a mhonaraíonn plátaí den sórt sin lena ndíol nó lena soláthar, nó a dhíolann nó a sholáthraíonn plátaí den sórt sin agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis an gclár sin a choimeád agus a chothabháil; dá chumasú don Aire sin, le rialacháin, a cheangal ar dhaoine den sórt sin taifid a choimeád, ar cibé modh a fhorordóidh an tAire sin le rialacháin, ar an monarú, an díol nó an soláthar sin; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le nithe a bhaineann le hiarratas ar aon chlárúchán a athnuachan faoin Acht seo; do dhíolmhú aon duine nó aon aicme daoine den sórt sin ó thaifid den sórt sin a choimeád i gcoitinne nó i leith aon aicme gnó; dá chumasú don Aire sin rialacháin a dhéanamh ionas gur féidir céannacht monaróra nó soláthróra aon phlátaí clárúcháin feithicle a chinneadh ó na plátaí sin; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hoifigigh údaraithe; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Iompair (Soláthróirí Plátaí Clárúcháin Feithicle), 2024

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the establishment of a body to be known as An tSeirbhís um Athbhreithniú Creidmheasa and to provide for its functions; to provide for the review by that body of certain credit decisions; to provide for the appointment of a chief executive officer of that body to be known as the Credit Reviewer; to provide for the repeal of section 210 of the National Asset Management Agency Act 2009 and the revocation of guidelines issued under that section; for those purposes to provide for consequential amendments of other enactments; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le comhlacht a bhunú ar a dtabharfar an tSeirbhís um Athbhreithniú Creidmheasa agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir lena feidhmeanna; do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis an gcomhlacht sin d’athbhreithniú breitheanna creidmheasa áirithe; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le príomh-oifigeach feidhmiúcháin, ar a dtabharfar an tAthbhreithnitheoir Creidmheasa, a cheapadh ar an gcomhlacht sin; do dhéanamh socrú chun alt 210 den Acht fán nGníomhaireacht Náisiúnta um Bainistíocht Sócmhainní, 2009 a aisghairm agus chun treoirlínte arna n-eisiúint faoin alt sin a chúlghairm; chun na gcríoch sin, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le leasuithe iarmhartacha ar achtacháin eile; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Athbhreithniú Creidmheasa, 2024

debates.showAs: Animal Sentience Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: An Act to amend the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 to make provision for an Animal Sentience Committee with functions relating to the effect of government policy on the welfare of animals as sentient beings.
bill.longTitleGa: Acht do leasú an Achta um Shláinte agus Leas Ainmhithe, 2013 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le Coiste um Mothaitheacht Ainmhithe ag a mbeidh feidhmeanna i ndáil le héifeacht bheartas an Rialtais ar leas ainmhithe mar neacha mothaitheacha.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Mothaitheacht Ainmhithe, 2024

debates.showAs: Finance (Provision of Access to Cash Infrastructure) Bill 2024: Second Stage
Finance (Provision of Access to Cash Infrastructure) Bill 2024: Referral to Select Committee

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the continued provision of sufficient and effective access to cash infrastructure for individuals and SMEs; to provide for access to cash criteria; to provide for a framework to manage future changes to access to cash infrastructure in a fair, equitable and transparent manner and for that purpose to provide for review and amendment of the access to cash criteria and for the identification of, and measures to be taken to remedy, local deficiencies in access to cash infrastructure and to ensure compliance with the access to cash criteria; to provide for the designation of entities on whom certain obligations are imposed to remedy local deficiencies and ensure compliance with the access to cash criteria; to provide for the monitoring and enforcement of obligations imposed on designated entities; to provide for the collection and publication of certain information by the Central Bank of Ireland; to provide for regulation by the Central Bank of Ireland of ATM deployers and cash-in-transit providers and for that purpose to provide for the registration of ATM deployers and cash-in-transit providers; to provide for the oversight of ATM operators and cash-in-transit providers and enforcement by the Central Bank of Ireland of compliance by ATM operators and cash-in-transit providers with their obligations under this Act; to provide for the sharing of information and cooperation between the Central Bank of Ireland and the Private Security Authority; for those and other purposes to amend the Central Bank Act 1942, the Central Bank Reform Act 2010, the Central Bank (Supervision and Enforcement) Act 2013 and the Companies Act 2014; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú chun go leanfar de rochtain leordhóthanach agus éifeachtach ar bhonneagar airgid thirim a sholáthar do phearsana aonair agus do FBManna; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le critéir i ndáil le rochtain ar airgead tirim; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le creat chun athruithe sa todhchaí ar rochtain ar bhonneagar airgid thirim a bhainistiú ar mhodh cóir, cothromasach agus trédhearcach agus, chun na críche sin, do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis na critéir i ndáil le rochtain ar airgead tirim a athbhreithniú agus a leasú agus maidir le heasnaimh áitiúla i rochtain ar bhonneagar airgid thirim a shainaithint agus maidir le bearta a bheidh le déanamh chun na heasnaimh sin a leigheas, agus a chinntiú go gcomhlíonfar na critéir i ndáil le rochtain ar airgead tirim; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le heintitis a shainainmniú, is eintitis a gcuirfear oibleagáidí áirithe orthu maidir le heasnaimh áitiúla a leigheas agus maidir lena chinntiú go gcomhlíonfar na critéir i ndáil le rochtain ar airgead tirim; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le faireachán a dhéanamh ar oibleagáidí arna bhforchur ar eintitis shainainmnithe agus maidir le forfheidhmiú na n-oibleagáidí sin; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le Banc Ceannais na hÉireann do bhailiú agus d’fhoilsiú faisnéis áirithe; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le Banc Ceannais na hÉireann do rialáil lucht curtha i ngníomh uathmheaisíní bainc agus soláthraithe airgid thirim faoi bhealach agus, chun na críche sin, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le lucht curtha i ngníomh uathmheaisíní bainc agus soláthraithe airgid thirim faoi bhealach a chlárú; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le formhaoirsiú ar oibritheoirí uathmheaisíní bainc agus ar sholáthraithe airgid thirim faoi bhealach agus maidir le Banc Ceannais na hÉireann d’fhorfheidhmiú chomhlíonadh a n-oibleagáidí faoin Acht seo ag oibritheoirí uathmheaisíní bainc agus ag soláthraithe airgid thirim faoi bhealach; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le comhroinnt faisnéise agus comhar idir Banc Ceannais na hÉireann agus an tÚdarás Slándála Príobháidí; chun na gcríoch sin agus chun críoch eile, do leasú Acht an Bhainc Cheannais, 1942, an Achta um Athchóiriú an Bhainc Ceannais, 2010, Acht an Bhainc Ceannais (Maoirsiú agus Forfheidhmiú), 2013 agus Acht na gCuideachtaí, 2014; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Finance (Provision of Access to Cash Infrastructure) Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Airgeadais (Rochtain ar Bhonneagar Airgid Thirim a Sholáthar), 2024

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Microenterprise Loan Fund Act 2012 to provide for the authorised share capital of Microfinance Ireland to be transferred from the Social Finance Foundation to the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment; for a board of directors of Microfinance Ireland; for a chief executive officer of Microfinance Ireland; for arrangements for superannuation benefits for members of the staff of Microfinance Ireland; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um an gCiste Iasachta do Mhionfhiontair, 2012 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le scairchaipiteal údaraithe Mhicrea-Airgeadas Éireann a aistriú ón bhFondúireacht Airgeadais Shóisialaigh chuig an Aire Fiontar, Trádála agus Fostaíochta; maidir le bord stiúrthóirí de chuid Mhicrea-Airgeadas Éireann; maidir le príomh-oifigeach feidhmiúcháin de chuid Mhicrea-Airgeadas Éireann; maidir le socruithe le haghaidh sochair aoisliúntais do chomhaltaí d’fhoireann Mhicrea-Airgeadas Éireann; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Health Information Bill 2024: Second Stage
Health Information Bill 2024: Second Stage (Resumed)
Health Information Bill 2024: Referral to Select Committee

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for a duty for health services providers to share, in certain circumstances, a patient’s personal health data with other health services providers also providing care and treatment to the patient; to provide for the creation and assignment of a Digital Health Record in respect of every patient; to provide for the information that shall be contained in a Digital Health Record; to provide for access to all, or part of, a Digital Health Record by certain categories of person; to provide for the restriction of such access in certain circumstances; to provide a patient with information in relation to access to his or her Digital Health Record; to provide for the Minister to make regulations for the purposes of this Act; to provide for the purposes in relation to which a Digital Health Record may be used; to provide that the Health Service Executive may enter into reciprocal arrangements with other jurisdictions in relation to the exchange of information contained in a Digital Health Record; to provide that the Health Service Executive may request health services providers to provide the Health Service Executive with certain classes of personal health data; to provide that the Health Service Executive may request certain persons to provide the Health Service Executive with certain categories of health information; to provide that the Health Service Executive may make an application to the Circuit Court where a person fails to comply with a request; to provide for the purposes for which the Health Service Executive may use health information provided to it in accordance with this Act; to provide that the Health Service Executive shall prepare and publish guidelines for the purposes of this Act; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le dualgas a bheith ar sholáthraithe seirbhísí sláinte sonraí sláinte pearsanta othair a chomhroinnt, in imthosca áirithe, le soláthraithe seirbhísí sláinte eile a bhfuil cúram agus cóireáil á soláthar don othar acu freisin; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le Taifead Sláinte Digiteach a chruthú agus a shannadh i leith gach othair; do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis an bhfaisnéis a bheidh i dTaifead Sláinte Digiteach; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le rochtain ag earnálacha áirithe duine ar Thaifead Sláinte Digiteach iomlán nó ar chuid de; do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis an rochtain sin a shrianadh in imthosca áirithe; do sholáthar faisnéis d’othar i ndáil le rochtain ar a Thaifead Sláinte Digiteach nó ar a Taifead Sláinte Digiteach; do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis an Aire do dhéanamh rialacháin chun críocha an Achta seo; do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis na críocha arb i ndáil leo a fhéadfar Taifead Sláinte Digiteach a úsáid; do dhéanamh socrú go bhféadfaidh Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte socruithe cómhalartacha a dhéanamh le dlínsí eile i ndáil le faisnéis atá i dTaifead Sláinte Digiteach a mhalartú; do dhéanamh socrú go bhféadfaidh Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte a iarraidh ar sholáthraithe seirbhísí sláinte aicmí áirithe sonraí sláinte pearsanta a sholáthar d'Fheidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte; do dhéanamh socrú go bhféadfaidh Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte a iarraidh ar dhaoine áirithe earnálacha áirithe faisnéise sláinte a sholáthar d'Fheidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte; do dhéanamh socrú go bhféadfaidh Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte iarratas a dhéanamh chun na Cúirte Cuarda i gcás go mainneoidh duine déanamh de réir iarrata; do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis na críocha chun a bhféadfaidh Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte úsáid a bhaint as faisnéis sláinte arna soláthar di de réir an Achta seo; do dhéanamh socrú go ndéanfaidh Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte treoirlínte a ullmhú agus a fhoilsiú chun críocha an Achta seo; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Fhaisnéis Sláinte, 2024

debates.showAs: Companies (Corporate Governance, Enforcement and Regulatory Provisions) Bill 2024: Second Stage
Companies (Corporate Governance, Enforcement and Regulatory Provisions) Bill 2024: Referral to Select Committee

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the conduct of, and participation in, general meetings of a company or industrial and provident society by the use of electronic communications technology; to repeal certain provisions of the Companies Act 2014 and the Industrial and Provident Societies Act 1893; to provide for the circumstances in which a company is not entitled to an audit exemption under section 358 of the Companies Act 2014; to provide for the disapplication of the Probation of Offenders Act 1907 to an offence under section 343 of the Companies Act 2014; to make certain amendments to the rescue process for small and micro companies; to provide for additional grounds for involuntary strike off of companies; to extend the list of competent authorities to which the Authority may disclose information, books or documents under section 792 of the Companies Act 2014; to provide for an offence of obstructing, interfering with or impeding an officer of the Corporate Enforcement Authority; to enable the Irish Auditing and Accounting Supervisory Authority to use money paid into the reserve fund in accordance with section 919 of the Companies Act 2014 in the performance of its functions under section 934 of that Act; to enable the Irish Auditing and Accounting Supervisory Authority to issue an interim direction in certain circumstances; to enable specified bodies to disclose information to the Corporate Enforcement Authority under section 944Q of the Companies Act 2014; and for those purposes, and other purposes, to amend the Companies Act 2014, the Industrial and Provident Societies Act 1893, and the Registration of Business Names Act 1963.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cruinnithe ginearálta de chuideachta nó de chumann tionscail agus soláthair a sheoladh, agus maidir le páirt a ghlacadh sa chéanna, trí theicneolaíocht cumarsáide leictreonaí a úsáid; d’aisghairm forálacha áirithe d’Acht na gCuideachtaí, 2014 agus den Industrial and Provident Societies Act, 1893; do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis na himthosca nach bhfuil cuideachta i dteideal díolúine ó iniúchadh faoi alt 358 d’Acht na gCuideachtaí, 2014; do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis an Probation of Offenders Act, 1907 a dhífheidhmiú maidir le cion faoi alt 343 d’Acht na gCuideachtaí, 2014; do dhéanamh leasuithe áirithe ar an bpróiseas tarrthála le haghaidh cuideachtaí beaga agus micreachuideachtaí; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le forais bhreise le cuideachtaí a bhaint go hainneonach den chlár; do leathnú an liosta d’údaráis inniúla a bhféadfaidh an tÚdarás faisnéis, leabhair nó doiciméid a nochtadh dóibh faoi alt 792 d’Acht na gCuideachtaí, 2014; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cion arb éard é cosc a chur ar oifigeach don Údarás um Fhorfheidhmiú Corparáideach, nó cur isteach air nó uirthi, nó bac a chur air nó uirthi; dá chumasú d’Údarás Maoirseachta Iniúchta agus Cuntasaíochta na hÉireann airgead a bheidh íoctha isteach sa chúlchiste de réir alt 919 d’Acht na gCuideachtaí, 2014 a úsáid i gcomhlíonadh a fheidhmeanna faoi alt 934 den Acht sin; dá chumasú d’Údarás Maoirseachta Iniúchta agus Cuntasaíochta na hÉireann treoir eatramhach a eisiúint in imthosca áirithe; dá chumasú do chomhlachtaí sonraithe faisnéis a nochtadh don Údarás um Fhorfheidhmiú Corparáideach faoi alt 944Q d’Acht na gCuideachtaí, 2014; agus, chun na gcríoch sin, agus chun críoch eile, do leasú Acht na gCuideachtaí, 2014, an Industrial and Provident Societies Act, 1893, agus an Achta um Chlárú Ainmneacha Gnó, 1963.
bill.shortTitleEn: Companies (Corporate Governance, Enforcement and Regulatory Provisions) Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: Bille na gCuideachtaí (Rialachas Corparáideach, Forfheidhmiú agus Forálacha Rialála), 2024

Defamation (Amendment) Bill 2024: Referral to Select Committee

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide that defamation actions in the High Court shall not be tried with a jury; to give effect to Directive (EU) 2024/1069 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 11 April 2024 on protecting persons who engage in public participation from manifestly unfounded claims or abusive court proceedings (‘Strategic lawsuits against public participation’) in so far as it relates to defamation proceedings; for those and other purposes to amend the Defamation Act 2009; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú nach dtriailfear le giúiré caingne clúmhillte san Ard-Chúirt; do thabhairt éifeacht do Threoir (AE) 2024/1069 ó Pharlaimint na hEorpa agus ón gComhairle an 11 Aibreán 2024 maidir le daoine a bhíonn ag gabháil do rannpháirtíocht phoiblí a chosaint ar éilimh atá go follasach gan bhunús nó ar imeachtaí cúirte mí-úsáideacha (‘Cásanna dlí straitéiseacha i gcoinne na rannpháirtíochta poiblí’) a mhéid a bhaineann sí le himeachtaí mar gheall ar chlúmhilleadh; chun na gcríoch sin agus chun críoch eile, do leasú an Achta um Chlúmhilleadh, 2009; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chlúmhilleadh (Leasú), 2024

debates.showAs: Mental Health Bill 2024: Second Stage (Resumed)
Mental Health Bill 2024: Referral to Select Committee
Mental Health Bill 2024: Second Stage
Mental Health Bill 2024: Second Stage (Resumed)

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the admission to, and discharge from, registered acute mental health centres, of adult persons in certain circumstances and, for the involuntary admission of adult persons who meet the criteria for involuntary admission to such centres; to provide for the criteria for, and review of, involuntary admission of adult persons to registered acute mental centres; and, for those purposes, to provide for the establishment of mental health review boards; to provide for the care and treatment of adult persons in registered acute mental health centres and to provide that treatment, other than in certain limited circumstances, shall not be given to adult persons without consent being given for such treatment; to regulate the application, in certain limited circumstances, of restrictive practices in respect of adult persons who are admitted to registered acute mental health centres; to provide for the admission to and discharge from registered acute mental health centres of children on a voluntary basis and with parental consent; to provide for the involuntary admission to, and discharge from, registered acute mental health centres of children who meet the criteria for involuntary admission of children to registered acute mental health centres by way of application to the District Court; to provide for the criteria for, and review of, involuntary admission of children to registered acute mental health centres; to provide for the treatment of children in registered acute mental health centres and to provide that treatment, other than in certain limited circumstances, shall not be given to children without consent being given for such treatment; to regulate the application, in certain limited circumstances, of restrictive practices in respect of children who are admitted to registered acute mental health centres; to provide for applications to be made to court to provide for the entitlements of persons admitted to registered acute mental health centres; to provide for the continuation in being of the Mental Health Commission and the Inspector of Mental Health Services; to provide for the establishment and maintenance of a register of acute mental health centres, a register of community mental health centres and a register of community mental health services for such centres and services registered under and in accordance with this Act; to provide for the regulation of mental health services including registered acute mental health centres, registered community mental health centres and registered community mental health services; to provide for the monitoring and enforcement of compliance with the provisions of this Act by the Mental Health Commission; to repeal the Mental Health Act 2001 and certain other enactments; to provide for the amendment of the Assisted Decision-Making (Capacity) Act 2015 and certain other enactments; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le haosaigh a ghlacadh isteach in ionaid ghéar-mheabhairshláinte chláraithe, agus a urscaoileadh astu, in imthosca áirithe, agus maidir le haosaigh, is aosaigh a chomhlíonann na critéir chun bheith glactha isteach in ionaid den sórt sin ar bhonn ainneonach, a ghlacadh isteach ar bhonn ainneonach; do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis na critéir chun aosaigh a ghlacadh isteach in ionaid ghéar-mheabhairshláinte chláraithe ar bhonn ainneonach, agus maidir le hathbhreithniú a dhéanamh ar an nglacadh isteach sin; agus, chun na gcríoch sin, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le boird athbhreithnithe meabhairshláinte a bhunú; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cúram agus cóireáil a thabhairt d’aosaigh in ionaid ghéar-mheabhairshláinte chláraithe agus do dhéanamh socrú nach dtabharfar cóireáil d’aosaigh gan toiliú a thabhairt le haghaidh na cóireála sin, seachas in imthosca teoranta áirithe; do dhéanamh rialáil, in imthosca teoranta áirithe, ar chleachtais srianta a chur i bhfeidhm maidir le haosaigh a ghlactar isteach in ionaid ghéar-mheabhairshláinte chláraithe; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le leanaí a ghlacadh isteach in ionaid ghéar-mheabhairshláinte chláraithe, agus a urscaoileadh astu, ar bhonn saorálach agus le toiliú tuismitheora; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le leanaí, is leanaí a chomhlíonann na critéir chun leanaí a ghlacadh isteach in ionaid ghéar-mheabhairshláinte chláraithe ar bhonn ainneonach, a ghlacadh isteach in ionaid ghéar-mheabhairshláinte chláraithe ar bhonn ainneonach, agus a urscaoileadh astu, ar mhodh iarratas chun na Cúirte Dúiche; do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis na critéir chun leanaí a ghlacadh isteach in ionaid ghéar-mheabhairshláinte chláraithe ar bhonn ainneonach, agus maidir le hathbhreithniú a dhéanamh ar an nglacadh isteach sin; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cóireáil a thabhairt do leanaí in ionaid ghéar-mheabhairshláinte chláraithe agus do dhéanamh socrú nach dtabharfar cóireáil do leanaí gan toiliú a thabhairt le haghaidh na cóireála sin, seachas in imthosca teoranta áirithe; do dhéanamh rialáil, in imthosca teoranta áirithe, ar chleachtais srianta a chur i bhfeidhm maidir le leanaí a ghlactar isteach in ionaid ghéar-mheabhairshláinte chláraithe; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hiarratais a dhéanamh chun na cúirte d’fhonn socrú a dhéanamh maidir le teidlíochtaí daoine a ghlactar isteach in ionaid ghéar-mheabhairshláinte chláraithe; do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis an gCoimisiún Meabhair-Shláinte agus maidir leis an gCigire Seirbhísí Meabhair-Shláinte a choimeád ar marthain; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le clár d’ionaid ghéar-mheabhairshláinte, clár d’ionaid mheabhairshláinte phobail, agus clár de sheirbhísí meabhairshláinte pobail le haghaidh na n-ionad agus na seirbhísí sin a chláraítear faoin Acht seo agus dá réir, a bhunú agus a chothabháil; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le rialáil seirbhísí meabhairshláinte, lena n-áirítear ionaid ghéar-mheabhairshláinte chláraithe, ionaid mheabhairshláinte phobail chláraithe agus seirbhísí meabhairshláinte pobail cláraithe; do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis an gCoimisiún Meabhair-Shláinte do dhéanamh faireachán ar chomhlíonadh fhorálacha an Achta seo agus d’fhorfheidhmiú chomhlíonadh fhorálacha an Achta seo; d’aisghairm an Achta Meabhair-Shláinte, 2001 agus achtacháin áirithe eile; do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis an Acht um Chinnteoireacht Chuidithe (Cumas), 2015 agus achtacháin áirithe eile a leasú; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Meabhair-Shláinte, 2024

bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Shláinte agus Leas Ainmhithe, 2013 chun tástáil Botox ar ainmhithe a thoirmeasc.
bill.shortTitleEn: Animal Health and Welfare (Prohibition of Animal Testing for Botox) (Amendment) Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Shláinte agus Leas Ainmhithe (Tástáil Botox ar Ainmhithe a Thoirmeasc) (Leasú), 2024

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for zoning date market value and zoning date use value in relation to certain land; for assessment of those values; for appeal against certain assessments of those values; for establishment of a land values register by each planning authority; for zoning value of land and assessment of that value; for an obligation to make zoning value payment to be a condition of certain planning permissions; for the amount of the zoning value payment; for the recovery of the zoning value payment; for an unpaid zoning payment to be a charge on certain land; for the discharge of the obligation to make a zoning value payment; for the use of the zoning value payments by planning authorities; for the repayment of certain zoning value payments; for arrangements for applications for planning permissions for development not subject to zoning value sharing; for certain offences relating to false or misleading information; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le margadhluach dáta criosaithe agus luach úsáide dáta criosaithe i ndáil le talamh áirithe; maidir leis na luachanna sin a mheasúnú; maidir le hachomharc i gcoinne measúnuithe áirithe ar na luachanna sin; maidir le gach údarás pleanála do bhunú clár luachanna talún; maidir le luach criosaithe talún agus maidir leis an luach sin a mheasúnú; go mbeidh oibleagáid chun íocaíocht luacha criosaithe a dhéanamh ina coinníoll de chuid ceadanna pleanála áirithe; maidir le méid na híocaíochta luacha criosaithe; maidir leis an íocaíocht luacha criosaithe a ghnóthú; go mbeidh íocaíocht chriosaithe neamhíoctha ina muirear ar thalamh áirithe; maidir le hurscaoileadh na hoibleagáide chun íocaíocht luacha criosaithe a dhéanamh; maidir le húdaráis phleanála d’usáid na n-íocaíochtaí luacha criosaithe; maidir le híocaíochtaí luacha criosaithe áirithe a aisíoc; maidir le socruithe le haghaidh iarratais ar cheadanna pleanála le haghaidh forbartha nach bhfuil faoi réir comhroinnt luacha criosaithe; maidir le cionta áirithe a bhaineann le faisnéis bhréagach nó mhíthreorach; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Talún (Luach Criosaithe a Chomhroinnt), 2024

as.showAs: Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the service of a notice of invitation to bid on a tenant of certain dwellings where the tenant is served with a notice of termination that cites as a ground for termination the landlord’s intention to enter into an enforceable agreement for the transfer of the dwelling to another; to provide for the service on such a tenant, or certain bodies, of a further notice in certain circumstances; to make provision in relation to the conduct of mediations, adjudications and Tribunal hearings by the Residential Tenancies Board; to make provision for the sharing of certain information by the Revenue Commissioners with the Residential Tenancies Board; and for those and other purposes to amend the Residential Tenancies Act 2004.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le fógra i dtaobh cuireadh chun imthairiscint a dhéanamh a sheirbheáil ar thionónta teaghaisí áirithe i gcás fógra foirceanta a sheirbheáil ar an tionónta, is fógra ina luaitear mar fhoras le foirceannadh go bhfuil beartaithe ag an tiarna talún comhaontú infhorfheidhmithe a dhéanamh chun an teaghais a aistriú chuig duine eile; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le fógra breise a sheirbheáil ar thionónta den sórt sin, nó ar chomhlachtaí áirithe, in imthosca áirithe; do dhéanamh socrú i ndáil leis an mBord um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe do sheoladh idirghabhálacha, breithnithe agus éisteachtaí Binse; do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim do chomhroinnt faisnéis áirithe leis an mBord um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe; agus, chun na gcríoch sin agus chun críoch eile, do leasú an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe (Leasú) (Uimh. 3), 2024

as.showAs: Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage

act.longTitleEn: Act to provide for an increase in the number of ordinary judges of the Court of Appeal and, for that purpose, to amend the Courts (Establishment and Constitution) Act 1961; to amend the Immigration Act 2003, the Judicial Council Act 2019, the Firearms and Offensive Weapons Act 1990, the European Arrest Warrant Act 2003 and the Criminal Justice (Mutual Recognition of Custodial Sentences) Act 2023; to amend the law in relation to the age at which certain public servants are required to retire; to confer a power on the Minister for Justice to make regulations relating to the retirement, including varying the retirement age, of certain public servants; to confer a power on the Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage to make regulations relating to the retirement of certain public servants, including varying the age at which such public servants shall retire; for those and other purposes, to amend the Superannuation (Prison Officers) Act 1919, the Civil Service Regulation Act 1956, the Local Government Act 2001, the Public Service Superannuation (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2004 and the Public Service Pensions (Single Scheme and Other Provisions) Act 2012; and to provide for related matters.
act.longTitleGa: Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le méadú ar líon na ngnáthbhreithiúna den Chúirt Achomhairc agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú Acht na gCúirteanna (Bunú agus Comhdhéanamh), 1961; do leasú an Achta Inimirce, 2003, an Achta um Chomhairle na mBreithiúna, 2019, Acht na nArm Tine agus na nArm Ionsaitheach, 1990, an Achta um Barántas Gabhála Eorpach, 2003 agus an Achta um Cheartas Coiriúil (Aitheantas Frithpháirteach do Phianbhreitheanna Coimeádta), 2023; do leasú an dlí i ndáil leis an aois ag a bhfuil sé de cheangal ar sheirbhísigh phoiblí áirithe dul ar scor; do thabhairt cumhacht don Aire Dlí agus Cirt chun rialacháin a dhéanamh maidir le scor seirbhíseach poiblí áirithe, lena n-áirítear rialacháin maidir le haois scoir na seirbhíseach poiblí sin a athrú; do thabhairt cumhacht don Aire Tithíochta, Rialtais Áitiúil agus Oidhreachta chun rialacháin a dhéanamh maidir le scor seirbhíseach poiblí áirithe, lena n-áirítear athrú a dhéanamh ar an aois ag a rachaidh na seirbhísigh phoiblí sin ar scor; chun na gcríoch sin agus chun críoch eile do leasú an Superannuation (Prison Officers) Act, 1919, Acht Rialuithe na Stát-Sheirbhíse, 1956; an Achta Rialtais Áitiúil, 2001, an Achta um Aoisliúntas na Seirbhíse Poiblí (Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha), 2004 agus an Achta um Pinsin na Seirbhíse Poiblí (Scéim Aonair agus Forálacha Eile), 2012; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
act.shortTitleEn: Courts, Civil Law, Criminal Law and Superannuation (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024
act.shortTitleGa: An tAcht um Chúirteanna, an Dlí Sibhialta, an Dlí Coiriúil agus Aoisliúntas (Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha), 2024

act.longTitleEn: Act to amend the law relating to rape; to amend the procedures applicable in proceedings for certain sexual offences including in relation to the adducing of evidence, the asking of questions, the exclusion of the public, the announcement of a verdict or decision and sentence and the anonymity of complainants and accused persons; and for those and other purposes to amend the Criminal Law (Rape) Act 1981 and certain other enactments; to provide for a mechanism for the identification of victims and presumed victims of human trafficking and the combatting of the trafficking of persons, to provide for the support of provision of assistance to such persons and, for those purposes, to provide for the establishment of a body to be known as the operational committee and to provide for its functions; to provide for the protection from deportation of certain persons; to amend the Defence Act 1954; to amend the Criminal Law (Human Trafficking) Act 2008; to give effect to the Optional Protocol to the Convention on the Rights of the Child on the sale of children, child prostitution and child pornography, done at New York on 25 May 2000, and for that purpose to amend the Sexual Offences (Jurisdiction) Act 1996 and the Criminal Justice (Mutual Assistance) Act 2008; and to provide for related matters.
act.longTitleGa: Acht do leasú an dlí a bhaineann le héigniú; do leasú na nósanna imeachta is infheidhme in imeachtaí i leith cionta gnéasacha áirithe lena n-áirítear i ndáil le fianaise a thabhairt ar aird, le ceisteanna a chur, leis an bpobal a eisiamh, le fíorasc nó breith agus pianbhreith a fhógairt agus le hanaithnideacht gearánach agus daoine cúisithe; agus, chun na gcríoch sin agus chun críoch eile, do leasú an Achta um an Dlí Coiriúil (Banéigean), 1981 agus achtacháin áirithe eile; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le sásra chun íospartaigh agus íospartaigh thoimhdithe gáinneála ar dhaoine a shainaithint agus chun gáinneáil ar dhaoine a chomhrac, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le tacú le cúnamh a sholáthar do dhaoine den sórt sin agus, chun na gcríoch sin, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le comhlacht a bhunú ar a dtabharfar an coiste oibríochta agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir lena fheidhmeanna; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le daoine áirithe a chosaint ar ionnarbadh; do leasú an Achta Cosanta, 1954; do leasú an Achta um an Dlí Coiriúil (Gáinneáil ar Dhaoine), 2008; do thabhairt éifeacht don Phrótacal Roghnach a ghabhann leis an gCoinbhinsiún um Chearta an Linbh maidir le díol leanaí, striapachas leanaí agus pornagrafaíocht leanaí, arna dhéanamh i Nua-Eabhrac an 25 Bealtaine 2000, agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta um Chionta Gnéasacha (Dlínse), 1996 agus an Achta um Cheartas Coiriúil (Cúnamh Frithpháirteach), 2008; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
act.shortTitleEn: Criminal Law (Sexual Offences and Human Trafficking) Act 2024
act.shortTitleGa: An tAcht um an Dlí Coiriúil (Cionta Gnéasacha agus Gáinneáil ar Dhaoine), 2024
